Articles.Content:
May I ask how they repair? There are no useful parts onboard them Also do you think you could make a new save where you space apart your tanks by at least 2.5km? because it is almost impossible to play the game with all the lag

Fine. Now time to find a strategic placement.

Edit: Just out of loading range and...

Edit 2: They repair wheels. Stops tanks from flipping over as easily.

Edit 3: Persistant

Edited August 16, 2014 by K3achas

I'd like to do a little battle in DMP, but it seems that weapons tend to glitch through/around their targets.

Lol, I know what you mean. Me and a friend were messing around, taking turns to try and hit each other with "Hellfire" SRB missiles while the other tried to launch a rocket... and when he hit me the missile went straight through. Anyway, do you suppose you and I could have a bit of a casual game some time soon, to introduce me to the world of persistence sharing battles?
I'll try a kmp dogfight type thing if someone wants.

I'll try a kmp dogfight type thing if someone wants.

I'd like to try with my F/A-18, but my internet service provider sucks. My speeds are both under 10 mb/s.

Also, I'd need someone to ride shotgun with me to control the missiles.

Edited August 16, 2014 by andrew123

Lol, I know what you mean. Me and a friend were messing around, taking turns to try and hit each other with "Hellfire" SRB missiles while the other tried to launch a rocket... and when he hit me the missile went straight through. Anyway, do you suppose you and I could have a bit of a casual game some time soon, to introduce me to the world of persistence sharing battles?

Sure! You want to set up or shall I?

Sure! You want to set up or shall I?

It's probably best that you do it

EDIT: The channel is at 599 at the moment, anybody care to round that number up for me?

EDIT EDIT: Yay! Now it's only 400 left to go until 1K.

Now with all craft(not counting the now one wheel repair vessel) are apart by 2.5km (also, 2 pairs).

Thanx Do you have the persist?

I will get to sdj's battle in the mean time.

daemon, I'm done with my move, I just need to get the persist/screenshots uploaded.

It's taking time due to my PC being a grumpy old thing that needs urgent upgrades to prevent it from becoming unusable.
Putting Comrades bomb bay on a Kite was either a terrible idea or a great one. I have not yet decided.

I've set up for the battle, Astecarmyman. How about this for rules: No more than 5 vehicles, no more than 55 tons, and stay within 5km of the "battlefield" flag. Air vehicles are fine but have tonnage doubled like before. I set up the battle on the northwest of the continent KSC is on. You can use Hyperedit lander with coordinates 15.71, 264.89. The "battlefield" flag is just next to those coordinates.

I have 4 vehicles with a total weight of just under 50 tons.

PERSISTENT

Yeah.. I don't think I will be able to battle you as the location you picked is really buggy.

I can't even land ships at the coordinates properly....

And sometimes this happens:

Or this:

Your vehicles were also floating above the ground or under the ground.

Hey guys, I'm back for combat!

Also, I'm up gunning it with 16 heavy ASM missiles in addition to the 20 VLS missiles.

//!/BATTLE ALERT/!//

Mechani Union Vs. HKA

Location: Duna

Rules: Standard (rules in thread OP), plus

1. Maximum of 4 craft (one [heavy] fighter, one frigate/patrol craft, one destroyer, and one battleship/dreadnought.)

2. Maximum partcount per craft is 800.

3. Only Fighters may land on Duna, if they are capable of it.

4. Max tonnage (per ship): 200 tons (with munitions and fuel at FULL).

MU Battle-group Grimm:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Persist: https://www.dropbox.com/s/obomtall0tu9wp6/persistent4.sfs

Sorry for the late reply; time zones and what not. Anyway, we may have to postpone this battle until I've gone through a few old messages and pieced together a fleet that actually stands a chance against the legions of the MU. I'll PM you when my fleet is organized.

I'm going to redo my ground forces. Those are all first attempts. (except the plane, I've built those before.)

Any tips on ship and tank building?

I'm going to redo my ground forces. Those are all first attempts. (except the plane, I've built those before.)

Any tips on ship and tank building?

Try making the ship more sleek and wide-hulled (Trimaran hull. It's versatile.). The Independence class is much more fast and maneuverable than my Kyoto Class destroyer. (Although the destroyer's meant to be a weapons hog. More missiles for everyone.)

I'll have the download link up soon.

Edited August 18, 2014 by andrew123

Try making the ship more sleek and wide-hulled (Trimaran hull. It's versatile.)

I prefer the design of RL battleships and frigates which is why I've gone for the single hull. Even at full speed that thing won't flip on a turn.
